description:
If you prefer digital to analogue, then you’ll appreciate the level of precision this is floor pump provides. From stroller tires to rock-hard road bike tires, a reliable floor pump is good way to keep the whole family’s bikes rolling smoothly. Tire pressure can be the difference between a great ride and one you want to forget.

  • ABS1 Pro flip chuck head threads onto both Schraeder and Presta valves and has an integrated Presta valve core wrench
  • Digital pressure display 0-220psi (0-15BAR)
  • Integrated presta valve core wrench
  • Ergonomic wood handle
  • Durable steel barrel and piston
  • Long 1.3m hose means no less spinning your tires to get that valve closer
name: Lezyne Sport Digital Drive Floor Pump
